snippet.title: LOK Digital - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2024
snippet.description:
LOK Digital is a whimsical puzzle adventure game where you discover magical words and use their special abilities to change the world around you. Learn and spell the words of the LOK creatures to bring them to life and expand their world, but remember that they can only live on black tiles.

LOK Digital will be released on PC in 2024. You can check out the LOK Digital demo on Steam until June 24.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
